## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires documentation update

<!--
Describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes.

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the [Apex Technical Standards](https://github.com/chirag127/ReadablePDF-AI-Documents-To-Speech-CLI-Tool/blob/main/AGENTS.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have updated the `README.md` if necessary
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant documentation in `CONTRIBUTING.md`, `SECURITY.md`, or `AGENTS.md`
- [ ] All CI checks pass with current changes
